main event: A bright round object with an orange glow was observed flying at a high rate of speed over Colorado Springs.
interesting points: The object was first observed at approximately 5000 feet altitude.,The sighting lasted for two to three seconds.,The object was seen disappearing behind mountains.,There were three observers at Colorado Springs and one observer ten miles north of it.,The report concludes the sighting could potentially be a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: one round bright object with orange glow
witness description: three observers at Colorado Springs and one observer ten miles north
